582140.name: Alien Attack in Space Demo
582140.description:
You are abandoned in a galaxy far far away. After regular cleaning from aliens in enemy territory, your team thought that all aliens are dead now and flew to Earth base. Now every one of aliens from nearest regions will hunt you down till death.

Fight them as long as you can. It will be the hardest battle in your life.

Demo Version of AAIS includes:
— 45 sec of gameplay
— 2 palettes
— every single enemy to kill
582140.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语
